data.text: @55krissi55 Every year the flu jab is changed to account for the seasonable variation. It doesn’t take years to test a vaccine. At school when I was little kids wore callipers from polio and died from simple diseases like measles.  The vaccine went through the same safety checks just quicker
@LaffinLounge @55krissi55 Lucky people never said this about TB, diphtheria, smallpox or we would all be fucking dead. Grow up and shut up, nobody is forcing you to act responsibly.
